column2: Lead HR Business Partner for Applications, BPO & Configured Platform
column9: Lead HR Business Partner for Applications, BPO, and Configured Platform globally.
column10: She oversees HR for Applications and BPO globally, making her a key contact to route to the correct HRBP or TA for North America.

column9: Chief HR Officer of NTT DATA.
column10: As CHRO, he can direct you to the HRBP/TA or VMO contacts for Applications & BPS in North America.
